ucaBot: Functions to ucaBot by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
ucaBot.MotorsList: Select the motor on the left or right
ucaBot.RGBLights: Select the RGBLights on the left or right
ucaBot.ServoList: Select the servo on the S1 or S2
ucaBot.backforward: TODO: full speed move back,speed is -100.
ucaBot.forward: TODO: full speed move forward,speed is 100.
ucaBot.motors: TODO: Set the speed of left and right wheels.
ucaBot.moveTime: TODO: Full speed operation lasts for 10 seconds,speed is 100.
ucaBot.setServo: TODO: Set the angle of servo.
ucaBot.singleheadlights: TODO: Select a headlights and set the RGB color.
ucaBot.trackEvent: TODO: Runs when line sensor finds or loses.
ucaBot.tracking: Judging the Current Status of Tracking Module.
ucaBot.tracking|param|state: Four states of tracking module, eg: TrackingState.L_R_line
ucaBot.ultrasonic: Cars can extend the ultrasonic function to prevent collisions and other functions..
